tool.name: gProfiler Convert
tool.description: converts between various types of namespaces

param.name: input
param.label: Input is whitespace-separated list of genes, proteins, probes, term IDs or chromosomal regions.

param.name: organism
param.label: Organism
param.help: Organism IDs are constructed by concatenating the first letter of the generic name and the specific name. Examples: human — Homo sapiens — 'hsapiens', mouse — Mus musculus — 'mmusculus', thale cress — Arabidopsis thaliana — 'athaliana'. Check the help section below for the complete list of supported organism IDs.

param.name: target_ns
param.label: Target namespace
param.help: Check the help section below for the complete list of supported namespaces.

param.name: numeric_ns
param.label: Numeric IDs treated as
param.help: The prefix for fully numeric IDs. Check the help section below for the complete list of supported namespaces (including numeric).

param.name: max
param.label: Maximum number of results per initial alias to show

param.name: filter_na
param.label: Filter N/A
param.help: Whether to filter out results without a corresponding target.
